title: Cross-Cultural Critical Thinking Enhancement Project: Social Inquiry Based on the SDOA Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social phenomena and proficiency in digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Online collaborative learning environment emphasizing critical thinking training based on multicultural society understanding

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze social issues presented in diverse cultural contexts according to six cognitive domains: memory, comprehension, analysis, evaluation, reasoning, and reflection
Learners can construct and evaluate evidence-based arguments based on peer feedback using digital collaboration tools
Learners can propose practical problem-solving solutions considering cultural differences through project deliverables and express them in various formats
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
